title: Is Google Scholar a scholarly source? - Quora

response.answer_text: Anyone can dump anything on Google. Blindly you can't trust on the data available on Google. As nowadays creating a website is an easy task. If you are from technical background or doing something that required absolute certainty, proof, authentication, then in that case you can't refer Google. On Google scholar everything is authentic, and true. And verified by engineers, and subject matter experts. So you can trust. Good Luck!!
